original_text: Saul agreed and he said to his servants, ‘Find someone who can make good music with a harp. Then bring him to me.’
korean_text: 사울이 신하에게 이르되 나를 위하여 잘 타는 사람을 구하여 내게로 데려오라 하니

sentences.original_text: and he said to his servants
Find someone who can make good music with a harp
sentences.korean_translation: 하프로 좋은 음악을 만들 수 있는 사람을 찾으시오
